text: @Alyssafarah @realDonaldTrump Who do you think believes that? From the beginning, donald & company have been on a mission to HIDE Coronavirus infections & deaths. Don wants to PRETEND all is “normal” because he thinks it will “help” w/the election. As a narcissistic psychopath, he does NOT care if ppl die.
